field.name: numberOfCounters
field.comment: This field contains the number of generic counters supported by the PMU. A counter is generic if it can count more than one event. When it is not possible to determine the number of generic counters, this field contains -1.

field.name: numberOfFixedCounters
field.comment: This field contains the number of fixed counters supported by the PMU. A counter is fixed if it hardwired to count only one event. When it is not possible to determine the number of generic counters, this field contains -1.

field.name: isPresent
field.comment: true if the PMU is present on the system

field.name: isDefaultPmu
field.comment: true if this is the default PMU on the system
